name: Activity Recognition
brief: This is an example pipeline for using machine learning for human activity recognition.
summary: We use the IMU sensors to classify the activity a person is performing. The activity recognition works best on events that are continuous such as walking or running. This pipeline uses a sliding window to segment data for classification. For best performance each segment should contain multiple cycles of the activity.

pipelines.info: This pipeline uses features optimized for human activity recognition combined with supervised machine learning classification algorithms to classify different activities (ie. running, walking, jumping).
